xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/129119-Araf/Somewhere in Between 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/uVH1mQ1hl2quBO13dGXJRsUWsyw.jpg Araf is the story of Zehra and Olgun whose lives are caught in a vacuum. The world in which they live and work is a place of throwaway culture and constant change. They too are waiting for a chance to change and escape from their empty, monotonous lives. Araf/Somewhere in Between
